## Authoring checklist

- Frontmatter name matches the directory and follows the naming rules.
- Description states capability and when to use it.
- SKILL.md stays under 500 lines; heavy details are in references/ or assets/.
- References use relative paths and shallow reference chains.
- Optional fields are only included when needed.

## Resources

- Reference: references/your-reference.md
- Asset: assets/your-asset.md
